name: Tiana Saves Christmas
description:
** Completely FREE with NO ADS **

Santa is getting ready to deliver all the presents for Christmas and they all got blown away in the wind.

Help the head elf Tiana save Christmas by collecting all the presents with Santa's sleigh, so all the kids around the world will get their Christmas presents in time.

Don't forget to keep the reindeer fed with carrots so they can use their magic to fly.

Watch out for the snowballs that will end the game.

Good luck!
